about_me_section.heading: About Me
about_me_section.sub_heading: I am a British full-stack developer, teacher and mentor. I love creating innovative web solutions, helping people learn to code and sharing my knowledge with others. Based in Kristiansand, Norway, I blend technical expertise with a creative approach to problem-solving.
paragraphs: I have extensive experience in both front-end and back-end development, specializing in building responsive, user-friendly web applications using modern frameworks and tools. My technical background allows me to tackle complex challenges across the entire development stack.
I'm currently open to new opportunities within Norway, the EU, and the UK.
I am passionate about teaching and mentoring, and I enjoy sharing my knowledge with others. I have experience in leading workshops, giving talks, and mentoring junior developers.
